overview: Yellow, blue and red, primary colors with their predominant emotional representations, from anger, passion and love to friendship, new beginnings and a sense of calm, become central to the story. They endeavor to delineate intimacy, conflict and the many ways emotional bonds define equations. It's essentially the story of Ayan, Zufi and Sarah, and the many forms of love they share between each other. The final result thus becomes a sincere attempt in portraying it all, while at the same time, dealing with the many nuances and complications of the same.
title: Blue Lemon
